A 22yearold male Orange Coast College student was arrested for masturbating in his car on Thursday PERIOD

Albert Arvayo an Irvine resident was arrested on suspicion of indecent exposure by the Costa Mesa Police Department PERIOD

According to the Orange County District Attorneys office no charges have been filed as of Wednesday afternoon PERIOD

A 21yearold female student reported to Campus Safety that she saw Arvayo masturbating in his white Chevrolet Malibu according to Chief of Campus Safety John Farmer PERIOD

Farmer said the woman was driving her car east in the aisle nearest to the Literature and Languages building in the Adams Avenue Parking Lot PERIOD

When she drove past Arvayo they made eye contact and he allegedly continued to masturbate according to Farmer PERIOD

Arvayo was suspended from his classes pending an investigation PERIOD
